remarks: The power series variable function is a function from the index set to elements of the power series structure representing ` X i ` for each ` i ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mvrf.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
mvrf.v $e |- V = ( I mVar R ) $.
mvrf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
mvrf.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
mvrf.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) $.
mvrf $p |- ( ph -> V : I --> B ) $.
